rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员开发了改变体内蛋白质特性的技术RIKEN 先锋研究集群 (CPR) 的研究人员开发出可以改变体内蛋白质的公认身份的技术。这项创新成果于 10 月 2 日发表在《自然通讯》杂志上，研究人员可以用一种蛋白质靶向小鼠肿瘤，然后将该蛋白质转运出体外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Researchers-develop-technology-to-change- Protein-identity-in-vivo.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Researchers-develop-technology-to-change- Protein-identity-in-vivo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b44cf4a-0e29-4596-8817-e8aa30e70861 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 00:20:06 -0400 Researchers develop technology to change protein identity in vivo
加州大学洛杉矶分校开发 CORE 评分来评估手术死亡风险加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究团队创建了共病手术风险评估 (CORE) 评分，以更好地考虑慢性病在患者术后死亡风险中所起的作用，使外科医生能够根据患者的既往状况进行调整，更轻松地确定死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/UCLA-develops-CORE-score-to-assess-surgical-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/UCLA-develops-CORE-score-to-assess-surgical-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd7f5430-66ae-4ac6-9d0e-c69fcc12bd31 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 00:18:22 -0400 UCLA develops CORE score to assess surgical mortality risk
初级保健机构未能解决女性潮热问题及时识别和治疗令人烦恼的潮热有可能改善许多女性的生活，并为雇主节省无数天的相关缺勤和工作效率损失。然而，一项新的研究发现，此类症状通常没有记录在电子健康记录 (EHR) 中，或者在初级保健就诊期间没有得到充分解决。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Primary-care-settings-failing-to-address-womens-hot-flashes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Primary-care-settings-failing-to-address-womens-hot-flashes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ca98663-04e0-40d8-b28b-9f033f318eef Thu, 03 Oct 2024 00:08:50 -0400 Primary care settings failing to address women's hot flashes
临时饲管管理研究荣获最高奖一名博士生的研究旨在解决临时饲管儿童家庭所面临的挑战，该博士生赢得了昆士兰大学 2024 年三分钟论文 (3MT) 决赛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Temporary-feeding-tube-management-research-earns-top-prize.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Temporary-feeding-tube-management-research-earns-top-prize.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7d9866e-3f21-4881-98fe-8828ecfff608 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 00:08:43 -0400 Temporary feeding tube management research earns top prize
使用象形图简化用药说明，以加强患者护理杜克-新加坡国立大学医学院引入了视觉辅助工具或象形图，旨在通过清晰和简单来改变患者护理，以使用药说明更加清晰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Simplifying-medication-instructions-with-pictograms-to-enhance-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Simplifying-medication-instructions-with-pictograms-to-enhance-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6c49076-bd15-4f7f-90c3-f0c1b50000d7 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 00:02:46 -0400 Simplifying medication instructions with pictograms to enhance patient care
怀孕期间的纯素饮食对母亲和婴儿有何影响？一项系统综述探讨了纯素饮食对孕产妇和胎儿结局的影响，揭示了对出生体重和营养摄入的不同结果，需要进一步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/How-does-a-vegan-diet-in-pregnancy-affect-mother-and-baby.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/How-does-a-vegan-diet-in-pregnancy-affect-mother-and-baby.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b95393fe-9557-46ee-ba61-14a74159478d Wed, 02 Oct 2024 23:52:00 -0400 How does a vegan diet in pregnancy affect mother and baby?
COVID-19 大流行期间，年轻人的抑郁症和焦虑症诊断激增研究人员分析了超过 170 万年轻人的临床数据，发现从 2017 年到 2021 年，确诊的抑郁症和焦虑症患者显着增加，其中在 COVID-19 大流行期间发病率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Depression-and-anxiety-diagnoses-in-youth-spiked-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Depression-and-anxiety-diagnoses-in-youth-spiked-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea687a22-cff3-4510-8276-bd23d0e64673 Wed, 02 Oct 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Depression and anxiety diagnoses in youth spiked during the COVID-19 pandemic
科学家确定了区分疾病和预测健康状况的肠道微生物特征研究揭示了中国人群不同疾病之间肠道微生物的显着差异，确定了可以高精度预测疾病状态的通用微生物特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Scientists-identify-gut-microbial-signatures-that-distinguish-diseases-and-predict-health-states.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Scientists-identify-gut-microbial-signatures-that-distinguish-diseases-and-predict-health-states.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f72689c9-bebb-469f-b57c-0e8468ddcdc4 Wed, 02 Oct 2024 23:15:00 -0400 Scientists identify gut microbial signatures that distinguish diseases and predict health states
针对免疫疗法耐药的脑转移瘤提出新疗法西班牙国家癌症研究中心（CNIO）的研究人员提出了一种新的治疗方法，用于治疗对免疫疗法反应不佳或根本没有反应的脑转移瘤，并提供生物标志物来预测应该在哪些情况下使用该疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/New-treatment-propose-for-brain-metastases-resistance-to-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/New-treatment-propose-for-brain-metastases-resistance-to-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=731ae73d-98ff-46c6-9578-630939c46c6a Wed, 02 Oct 2024 21:58:00 -0400 New treatment proposed for brain metastases resistant to immunotherapy
减少久坐时间可有效预防背痛恶化芬兰图尔库大学的一项新研究表明，减少每日久坐可以防止背痛在六个月内恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Reducing-sedentary-time-found- effective-in-preventing-worsening-back-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241002/Reducing-sedentary-time-found- effective-in-preventing-worsening-back-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72d821e0-eccd-49c5-bba5-b4c7a88c19ea Wed, 02 Oct 2024 21:54:00 -0400 Reducing sedentary time found effective in preventing worsening back pain
